schema.name: Application Response
schema.description: A document to indicate the applicationâ€™s response to a transaction. This may be a business response and/or a technical response, sent automatically by an application or initiated by a user.

schema.name: Attached Document
schema.description: A UBL wrapper that allows a document of any kind to be packaged with the UBL document that references it.

schema.name: Awarded Notification
schema.description: The document used to communicate a contract award to the winner.

schema.name: Bill Of Lading
schema.description: A document that conveys information about an instance of a transportation service and may under some circumstances serve as a contractual document For the service. See Bill of Lading and compare with Waybill.

schema.name: Call For Tenders
schema.description: A document used by a Contracting Party to define a procurement project to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.

schema.name: Catalogue
schema.description: A document that describes items, prices, and price validity. See Catalogue.

processes.process: Initial Stocking of the Area by Producer

schema.name: Catalogue Deletion
schema.description: A document used to cancel an entire Catalogue.

schema.name: Catalogue Item Specification Update
schema.description: A document used to update information (e.g., technical descriptions and properties) about Items in an existing Catalogue.

schema.name: Catalogue Pricing Update
schema.description: A document used to update information about prices in an existing Catalogue.

schema.name: Catalogue Request
schema.description: A document used to request a Catalogue.

schema.name: Certificate Of Origin
schema.description: A document that describes the Certificate of Origin.

schema.name: Contract Award Notice
schema.description: A document published by a Contracting Party to announce the awarding of a procurement project.

schema.name: Contract Notice
schema.description: A document used by a Contracting Party to announce a project to buy goods, services or works.

schema.name: Credit Note
schema.description: A document used to specify credits due to the Debtor from the Creditor.

schema.name: Debit Note
schema.description: A document used to specify debts incurred by the Debtor.

schema.name: Despatch Advice
schema.description: A document used to describe the despatch or delivery of goods and services.

schema.name: Document Status
schema.description: A document used to provide information about document status.
schema.submitterRole: Party currently controlling Status of the collaboration

schema.name: Document Status Request
schema.description: A document used to request the status of another document.
schema.receiverRole: Party currently controlling Status of the collaboration

schema.name: Exception Criteria
schema.description: A document used to specify the thresholds for forecast variance, product activity, and performance history beyond which exceptions should be triggered.

schema.name: Exception Notification
schema.description: A document used to notify an exception in forecast variance, product activity, or performance history.

schema.name: Forecast
schema.description: A document used to forecast sales or orders.

schema.name: Forecast Revision
schema.description: A document used to revise a Forecast.

schema.name: Forwarding Instructions
schema.description: A document issued to a forwarder, giving instructions regarding the action to be taken for the forwarding of goods described therein. See Forwarding Instructions.

schema.name: Freight Invoice
schema.description: A document stating the charges incurred for a logistics service.

schema.name: Fulfilment Cancellation
schema.description: A document used to cancel an entire Despatch Advice or Receipt Advice.

schema.name: Goods Item Itinerary
schema.description: A document providing details relating to a transport service, such as transport movement, identification of equipment and goods, subcontracted service providers, etc.

schema.name: Guarantee Certificate
schema.description: A document to notify the deposit of a bid bond guarantee.

schema.name: Instruction For Returns
schema.description: A document used to initiate a return of goods. The producer is requesting the return of products that are not selling well, either to use in other places or to free up rack or shelf space.

schema.name: Inventory Report
schema.description: A report on the quantities of each item that are, or will be, in stock. This document is sent by a Buyer (for example a retailer) to a Seller (for example a producer).

schema.name: Invoice
schema.description: A document used to request payment.

schema.name: Item Information Request
schema.description: A document used to request product activity, forecast, or performance data.

schema.name: Order
schema.description: A document used to order goods and services.

schema.name: Order Cancellation
schema.description: A document used to cancel an entire Order.

schema.name: Order Change
schema.description: A document used to specify changes to an existing Order.

schema.name: Order Response
schema.description: A document used to indicate detailed acceptance or rejection of an Order or to make a counter-offer.

schema.name: Order Response Simple
schema.description: A document used to indicate simple acceptance or rejection of an entire Order.

schema.name: Packing List
schema.description: A document describing how goods are packed.

schema.name: Prior Information Notice
schema.description: A document used by a contracting party to declare the intention to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.

schema.name: Product Activity
schema.description: A document reporting the movement of goods at specified retail locations for inventory tracking purposes.

schema.name: Quotation
schema.description: A document used to quote for the provision of goods and services.

schema.name: Receipt Advice
schema.description: A document used to describe the receipt of goods and services.

schema.name: Reminder
schema.description: A document used to remind a customer of payments overdue.

schema.name: Remittance Advice
schema.description: A document that specifies details of an actual payment.

schema.name: Request For Quotation
schema.description: A document used to request a Quotation for goods and services from a seller.

schema.name: Retail Event
schema.description: A document used to specify basic information about retail events (such as promotions, product introductions, and community or environmental events) that affect supply or demand.

schema.name: Self Billed Credit Note
schema.description: A credit note created by the debtor in a self billing arrangement with a creditor; Self Billed Credit Note replaces Debit Note in such arrangements.

schema.name: Self Billed Invoice
schema.description: An invoice document created by the customer (rather than the supplier) in a Self Billing relationship.

schema.name: Statement
schema.description: A document used to report the status of orders, billing, and payment. This document is a statement of account, not a summary invoice.

schema.name: Stock Availability Report
schema.description: A report on the quantities of each item that are, or will be, in stock. This document is sent by a Seller (for example a producer) to a Buyer (for example a retailer).

schema.name: Tender
schema.description: A document whereby an economic operator (the tenderer) makes a formal offer (the tender) to a contracting authority to execute an order for the supply or purchase of goods, or for the execution of work, according to the terms of a proposed contract.

schema.name: Tender Receipt
schema.description: A document sent by a contracting party to an economic operator acknowledging receipt of a Tender.

schema.name: Tenderer Qualification
schema.description: A document declaring the qualifications of a tenderer.

schema.name: Tenderer Qualification Response
schema.description: A document issued by a procurement organization to notify an economic operator whether it has been admitted to or excluded from the tendering process.

schema.name: Trade Item Location Profile
schema.description: A document specifying trade item attributes relating to replenishment policies.

schema.name: Transport Execution Plan
schema.description: A document used in the negotiation of a transport service between a transport user and a transport service provider.

schema.name: Transport Execution Plan Request
schema.description: A document sent by a transport user to request a transport service from a transport service provider.

schema.name: Transport Progress Status
schema.description: A document sent from a transportation network manager to a transport service provider giving the status of the whereabouts and schedule of the transport means involved in a transport service.

schema.name: Transport Progress Status Request
schema.description: A document sent from a transport service provider to a transportation network manager requesting a Transport Progress Status.

schema.name: Transport Service Description
schema.description: A document sent by a transport service provider to announce the availability of a transport service.

schema.name: Transport Service Description Request
schema.description: A document requesting a Transport Service Description, sent from a party with a transport demand (transport user) to a party providing transport services (transport service provider).

schema.name: Transportation Status
schema.description: A document to circulate reports of transportation status or changes in status (events) among a group of participants.

schema.name: Transportation Status Request
schema.description: A document requesting a Transportation Status report.

schema.name: Unawarded Notification
schema.description: A document communicating to a tenderer that the contract has been awarded to different tenderer.

schema.name: Utility Statement
schema.description: A supplement to an Invoice or Credit Note, containing information on the consumption of services provided by utility suppliers to private and public customers, including electricity, gas, water, and telephone services.

schema.name: Waybill
schema.description: A transport document describing a shipment. It is issued by the party who undertakes to provide transportation services, or undertakes to arrange for their provision, to the party who gives instructions for the transportation services (shipper, consignor, etc.). It states the instructions for the beneficiary and may contain the details of the transportation, charges, and terms and conditions under which the transportation service is provided. See Waybill and compare with Bill of Lading.

schema.name: Expression Of Interest Response
schema.description: A document whereby a Contracting Authority accepts receiving an Expression Of Interest from an Economic Operator (the tenderer)

schema.name: Expression Of Interest Request
schema.description: A document whereby an Economic Operator (the tenderer) makes an Expression Of Interest in a Call For Tenders to a Contracting Authority

schema.name: Qualification Application Request
schema.description: A document whereby a Contracting Authority makes a description of the required qualification Application (In Europe: ESPD Request) to an Economic Operator (the tenderer)

schema.name: Qualification Application Response
schema.description: A document whereby an Economic Operator (the tenderer) makes a description of the required qualification Application (In Europe: ESPD Response) to an Contracting Authority

schema.name: Tender Contract
schema.description: A document whereby a Contracting Authority sends information to the Economic Operator describing the final contract after a tendering procedure.

schema.name: Tender Status Request
schema.description: A document whereby an Economic Operator (the tenderer) asking about the details and status of a tendering procedure

schema.name: Tender Status
schema.description: A document whereby a Contracting Authority sends information to the Economic Operator describing the status of a tendering procedure.

schema.name: Tender Withdrawal
schema.description: A document whereby an Economic Operator (the tenderer) makes a Tender Withdrawal to a Contracting Authority

schema.name: Unsubscribe From Procedure Response
schema.description: A document whereby a Contracting Authority accepts receiving an Unsubscribe From Procedure from an Economic Operator (the tenderer) and sends a confirmation

schema.name: Unsubscribe From Procedure Request
schema.description: A document whereby an Economic Operator (the tenderer) wants to Unsubscribe From Procedure and sends it to Contracting Authority

schema.name: Business Card
schema.description: A document used to provide information about a business party and its business capabilities.

schema.name: Digital Capability
schema.description: A document used to provide information about a business party and its digital capabilities.

schema.name: Digital Agreement
schema.description: A document used to support business parties agreeing on a set of digital processes, terms and conditions to ensure interoperability.

schema.name: Weight Statement
schema.description: A document used to report weight or verified mass measurements in the transport chain.

schema.name: Enquiry
schema.description: A document sent by a requestor to a responder requesting information about a particular business process.

schema.name: Enquiry Response
schema.description: A document sent by a responder to a requester answering a particular enquiry.

schema.name: Export Customs Declaration
schema.description: A document used to declare goods for exportation

schema.name: Import Customs Declaration
schema.description: A document used to declare goods for import

schema.name: Transit Customs Declaration
schema.description: A document used to declare goods for transit

schema.name: Goods Certificate
schema.description: A document used to prove one or more requirements about goods under transport

schema.name: Goods Item Passport
schema.description: A document used to declare goods for temporary exportation

schema.name: Proof Of Reexportation
schema.description: A document used to prove reexportation of goods

processes.process: Goods Item Passport Proof of Re-exportation

schema.name: Proof Of Reexportation Reminder
schema.description: A reminder that a requested Proof of Reexportation is pending

processes.process: Goods Item Passport Proof of Re-exportation

schema.name: Proof Of Reexportation Request
schema.description: A document used request a proof of reexportation

processes.process: Goods Item Passport Proof of Re-exportation

schema.name: Manifest
schema.description: A document used to specify the quantity and nature of cargo and personel for a single shipment stage often expressed as a set of consignments.

schema.name: Common Transportation Report
schema.description: A document used report transportation events to an authority.

schema.name: Business Information
schema.description: A document used to provide information about a business.

schema.name: Purchase Receipt
schema.description: A receipt for a purchase made with cash or cash equivalents.
